agents.impl.dhcp

Class DhcpServerAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • agents.MetaAgent
      • agents.SystemAgent
        • agents.impl.dhcp.NetworkableAgent
          • agents.impl.dhcp.DhcpServerAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DhcpServer

    public class DhcpServerAgent
extends NetworkableAgent
implements DhcpServer
    MetaAgent implementation of the server-side behaviour of the DHCP process.
    See Also:
    DhcpServer

      boolean canReceive(Message message)
      Calls the super version of this method to check if this agent can receive or checks if the qualified address matches the message's recipient.

      Concrete implementation of the DhcpServer interfaces method.

      Concrete implementation of the DhcpServer interfaces method.

      Checks if the message can be received and if the message contains the appropriate message for DHCP is is transferred tho the respective method.
      void setIpAddress(java.lang.String ipAddress)
      Overridden setter for IP address which does not change the IP of the DHCP server; as its IP must be set statically.

        public boolean canReceive(Message message)
        Description copied from class: NetworkableAgent
        Calls the super version of this method to check if this agent can receive or checks if the qualified address matches the message's recipient.
        Overrides:
        canReceive in class NetworkableAgent
        Parameters:
        message - The message that we to check if we can receive it.
        Returns:
        True if we can receive the message; false otherwise.
